Lotfy Labib (Arabic, a mụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn na ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye mgbasa ozi n'otu oge
N'agbanyeghị na ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Theatrical Arts n'afọ 1970, ọrụ Labib na-egbu oge ruo afọ iri
Mbụ, e debara aha ya na ndị agha ruo afọ isii, wee gaa n'èzí Egypt ruo afọ anọ
Ọrụ ya malitere n'ezie n'afọ 1981, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu "The Bald Singer," nke ọ sochiri na mmepụta ihe ọzọ "The Hostages"
Labib arụwo ọrụ nke ukwuu kemgbe ahụ, n'ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado ma a na-echefu echefu, na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 200 na telivishọn
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ngosi ya dị mkpirikpi, Labib emeela nke ọma ma gosipụta onwe ya ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ike nke ọgbọ ya
Ọ pụtara na 387 sequels (usoro, ihe nkiri, redio na ndị ọzọ) kemgbe afọ 1988.
